column1: Master of Science in Data Analytics and Business Economics (MScDABE)
column5: OverviewThe rapid technological progress has dramatically altered the business landscape and job markets. A lot more companies are strategically searching for analytics-enabled people with business economics knowledge as well as statistical and programming skills for providing business insights and responding to changes in an intellectual property policy, and competition and regulatory policies.
column7: (1) Non-local students: HKD$ 210,000 (2) Local students: HKD$ 150,000 Note: Tuition fee is subject to annual review.
